name: 智慧型控制
restrict: ◎必須先修過(也可以同時修)【AEU0043  控制系統】 ◎課程開放上修
description: Nowadays intelligent control techniques are successfully used in many control applications. The course focuses on providing an introduction to the emerging area of intelligent control and optimization using a control-engineering approach. It includes state-of-the-art intelligent control approaches such as fuzzy, neural network, fuzzy-neural, hybrid structure, and adaptive approaches. Through various examples, students will learn how to apply intelligent control techniques to real engineering problems with python and matplotlib.
goals: Understand how to solve engineering control problems by applying intelligent techniques.
Understand how to use programming to simulate and analyze engineering control problems.
Evaluate performance of several intelligent control methods.
syllabus:
(預估每1-2週講授一主題)

1.          Introduction to intelligent control

2.          Theory foundation of fuzzy control

3.          Fuzzy control

4.          Adaptive fuzzy control

5.          Theory foundation of neural network

6.          Typical and improved neural networks

7.          Fuzzy-neural network

8.          Neural network for system modeling

9.          Adaptive neural network control

10.      Genetic Algorithm

11.      Hybrid structure control

methodologies.note: 課堂中將會依序介紹不同智慧型控制方法之原理與設計方式，並帶領同學以模擬之方式對工程上之實務問題進行分析探討，最後亦將介紹國際間該領域之最新技術發展與趨勢。
最近相關研究文獻研讀報告
